fields.name: Istanbul
fields.description: Istanbul served as an imperial capital for almost 16 centuries, during the Roman, Byzantine and Ottoman empires.

fields.name: Berlin
fields.description: Berlin is a world city of culture, politics, media and science.

fields.name: San Fransisco
fields.description: A popular tourist destination, San Francisco is known for its cool summers, fog, steep rolling hills, eclectic mix of architecture, and landmarks.
